value.title: Learn about the underlying Software in Azure Cloud Shell | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn about the software found inside an Azure Cloud Shell instance. Get a deeper look into what happens when you fire an Azure Cloud Shell and what is happening in the underlying operating system.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wODji8h6YYI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: PowerShell in Azure Cloud Shell GA | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Danny Maertens and Scott Hanselman discuss updates made to PowerShell in Azure Cloud Shell. Learn about PowerShell Core in Linux, new Azure VM remoting cmdlets, and integration with Exchange. [00:43]  Demo Start   Azure Cloud Shell documentation https://aka.ms/azfr/490/01  Quickstart for PowerShell in
